pkgmetadata.longdescription: Instagram 2014 Vancouver Top Colour Dataset // A dataset of the top colours of photos from Instagram taken in 2014 in the city of Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. It consists of: top colour and counts data. This data was obtained using the Instagram API. Instagram is a web photo sharing service. It can be found at: https://instagram.com. The Instagram API is documented at: https://instagram.com/developer/.
